sentences.chinese: 鄭桓公友者，周厲王少子而宣王庶弟也。
sentences.literal: Zheng Huan Gong You was Zhou Li Wang's youngest son and Xuan Wang's concubine younger brother.

sentences.chinese: 宣王立二十二年，友初封于鄭。
sentences.literal: In Xuan Wang's twenty-second year, You was initially enfeoffed at Zheng.

sentences.chinese: 封三十三歲，百姓皆便愛之。
sentences.literal: Enfeoffed for thirty-three years, all the common people found him convenient and loved him.
You Wang made him Si Tu.

sentences.chinese: 和集周民，周民皆說，河雒之閒，人便思之。
sentences.literal: He harmonized and gathered the Zhou people. The Zhou people were all pleased. Between the He and Luo rivers, people conveniently thought of him.

sentences.chinese: 為司徒一歲，幽王以褒后故，王室治多邪，諸侯或畔之。
sentences.literal: As Si Tu for one year, You Wang because of the Bao Hou affair, the wang chamber's governance had much evil. Some feudal lords rebelled against it.

sentences.chinese: 於是桓公問太史伯曰：「王室多故，予安逃死乎？」
sentences.literal: Thereupon Huan Gong asked Tai Shi Bo said: 'Wang chamber many troubles, I where escape death?'

sentences.chinese: 太史伯對曰：「獨雒之東土，河濟之南可居。」
sentences.literal: Tai Shi Bo replied said: 'Only Luo east land, He Ji south can reside.'

sentences.chinese: 對曰：「地近虢、鄶，虢、鄶之君貪而好利，百姓不附。
sentences.literal: Replied said: 'Land near Guo, Xu, Guo, Xu lords greedy and fond profit, common people not attach.

sentences.chinese: 今公為司徒，民皆愛公，公誠請居之，虢、鄶之君見公方用事，輕分公地。
sentences.literal: Now the gong is Si Tu. The people all love the gong. If the gong sincerely requests to reside there, the lords of Guo and Xu, seeing the gong just in power, will lightly divide land for the gong.

sentences.chinese: 公誠居之，虢、鄶之民皆公之民也。」
sentences.literal: Gong sincerely reside there, Guo, Xu people all gong people.'

sentences.chinese: 公曰：「吾欲南之江上，何如？」
sentences.literal: Gong said: 'I desire south to Jiang Shang, what like?'

sentences.chinese: 對曰：「昔祝融為高辛氏火正，其功大矣，而其於周未有興者，楚其後也。
sentences.literal: Replied said: 'Former Zhu Rong as Gao Xin Shi fire official, his merit great, but he at Zhou not yet had prosperous, Chu his descendant.
When Zhou declines, Chu will certainly prosper.
